snippet.title: "Store Galore" OST and gameplay
snippet.description:
Have you ever wondered how NPCs keep their shops running smoothly?  Find the answer in "Store Galore", another entry for LOWREZJAM 2020.  Composed with the Pico-8 fantasy console.

Play the game (in browser!) here:
munro.itch.io/store-galore

Various places to check out the developer:
munrohoberman.com
twitter.com/MunroHoberman
munro.itch.io
